thread.title: Keno Brothers and Proxibid Partner to Bring Rolling Sculpture Fine Automobile Auction to Global Online Buyers
thread.title_full: Keno Brothers and Proxibid Partner to Bring Rolling Sculpture Fine Automobile Auction to Global Online Buyers - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Keno Brothers and Proxibid Partner to Bring Rolling Sculpture Fine Automobile Auction to Global Online Buyers
text:
Proxibid
Inaugural Keno Brothers Automotive Event Redefines Auction Process with New Proprietary Software and Secure Online Bidding Solutions
OMAHA, Neb. , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Proxibid ( www.proxibid.com ), the most trusted online Marketplace for buying and selling highly valued items, has partnered with Keno Brothers Fine Automobile Auctions ( www.kenobrothers.com ) to bring its inaugural Rolling Sculpture Fine Automobile Auction to the Proxibid Marketplace. Forty of the most coveted collector cars available will cross the block during a live auction taking place Thursday, November 19, 2015 at 6:00 pm Eastern at Skylight Clarkson Sq. in Soho, New York City . Bidders from anywhere in the world with an internet connection can bid live online via Proxibid during the auction. Interested buyers can preview the catalog and place prebids now at www.proxibid.com/kenobrothers .
Leigh Keno and Leslie Keno , co-founders and co-CEOs of Keno Brothers Fine Automobile Auctions, each have decades of involvement and vast understanding in the arts and antiques auction field, as well as an individual passion for fine automobiles, which led to the creation of an automotive auction house that marries the most exquisite live auctions with sophisticated online capabilities provided by Proxibid. Keno Brothers selected Proxibid as their online partner because of its commitment to risk management and wealth of knowledge in bringing more than 12,000 sales events to online buyers each year, providing a trusted online experience that increases buyer confidence.
"Our partnership with Proxibid enables us to share our enthusiasm for fine automobiles with collectors across the globe," said Leslie Keno . "Only Proxibid delivers the level of security and support online buyers require for the purchase and sale of vehicles at the caliber we're offering in this auction. Buyers can trust Proxibid to deliver the same level of care and integrity as they would experience if they attended the live auction."
Proxibid features the industry's most comprehensive risk management system?a sophisticated hybrid of proprietary technology and third-party partnerships managed by an in-house team of experts?designed specifically to facilitate high dollar transactions like collector cars, giving assurance that purchases are secure. This level of security, in conjunction with Keno Brothers' proprietary catalog software, which provides background information, history, sales data, videos, news articles, social mentions, and other helpful information about each vehicle, ensures buyers have a heightened level of confidence when purchasing online.
Featured automobiles include:
1969 Lamborghini Miura P400 S , ( https://vimeo.com/134420682 ) 1966 Aston Martin DB6 Vantage , ( https://vimeo.com/142159989 ) 1969 Ferrari 365 GTB4 Daytona N.A.R.T. Competizione , ( https://vimeo.com/140957081 ) 1983 PORSCHE / MARCH 83G-4 IMSA RACECAR , ( https://vimeo.com/140957082 ) "Proxibid is proud to partner with Keno Brothers Fine Automobile Auctions to introduce a new way for collector car enthusiasts to purchase their next vehicle online," said Ryan Downs , President and CEO of Proxibid. "Our robust online bidding platform and sophisticated risk management system ensures Proxibid is the most trusted place for collectors to seek and buy the highly valuable items they covet. This auction features vehicles of the highest quality, and we are excited to share them with buyers located throughout the world."
Combined with Proxibid's industry-leading and secure transaction engine, the Keno Brothers' proprietary catalog software creates a comprehensive visual tool set that is extremely rich for online buyers, and which generates a high level of consumer confidence in Keno Brothers and the collector cars available for sale.
"In the current marketplace, one usually needs to research a car's background on their own, from a wide variety of sources. Our system aggregates a variety of data from around the Internet that is helpful in considering the acquisition of a fine automobile," commented Bradley Farrell , COO of Keno Brothers and developer of the proprietary process.
"Our clients now have a one-stop solution for gaining both general and specific information about each car, along with sales trends, PPI and other key data points that can inform a positive purchase decision. We want the online auction experience to closely match our live event, so buyers can feel comfortable and informed whether they bid online or join us in person."
For more information about this auction, to view the online catalog, or to bid, please visit www.proxibid.com/kenobrothers .
Proxibid Social
Visit us online at www.proxibid.com
"Like" us on Facebook www.facebook.com/proxibid
Follow us on Twitter www.twitter.com/proxibid
Visit our blog Fresh.Proxibid.com
About Proxibid
Proxibid provides auction companies and asset owners with access to the most trusted online Marketplace for buying and selling highly valued items. More than $3 billion in inventory passes through Proxibid's Marketplace annually via live and timed auctions, as well as Buy Now and Make Offer capabilities, across 15 categories that include heavy equipment; industrial machinery; real estate; fine art, antiques and collectibles, and more.
Founded in 2001, Proxibid is headquartered in Omaha, NE with offices in South Sioux City, NE and London. For more information about Proxibid, please visit www.proxibid.com .
About Keno Brothers
Keno Brothers Fine Automobile Auctions ( www.kenobrothers.com ) is a new venture focused on exceptional collector cars, founded by famed auctioneers and appraisers Leigh and Leslie Keno along with partner Ken Sterne, an experienced trader of exotic and collector cars. The Keno brothers have been immersed in the world of classic cars from a very young age and have a passion for discovering unexpected rarities. They enjoy racing and rallying historic cars and have served as judges at prestigious auto events, including a decade of service with the Pebble Beach Concours d'Elegance. The company is dedicated to offering a unique online buying and selling experience, with the highest level of security and transparency throughout the purchasing process.
